channel.title: NPR Programs: All Things Considered
channel.description: All Things Considered hosts Ailsa Chang, Mary Louise Kelly, Juana Summers and Scott Detrow present the program's trademark mix of news, interviews, commentaries, reviews, and offbeat features 7 days a week.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Is the whiskey industry in trouble?
item.description: NPR's Mary Louise Kelly speaks with bourbon expert Fred Minnick on what Jim Beam's halting distillation at main distillery reveals about the challenges facing the bourbon industry and the year ahead.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Mary Louise Kelly speaks with bourbon expert Fred Minnick on what Jim Beam's halting distillation at main distillery reveals about the challenges facing the bourbon industry and the year ahead.
item.dc:creator: Elena Burnett

item.title: A hike up Mount Kilimanjaro holds lessons for a new year
item.description: As a new year begins, a hike up Africa's highest peak is a reminder that slowing down is sometimes the key to success.
item.content:encoded: As a new year begins, a hike up Africa's highest peak is a reminder that slowing down is sometimes the key to success.
item.dc:creator: Ciara Hulet

item.title: President Trump has threatened Iran as protests widen over a crumbling economy
item.description: President Trump is threatening he will take action if Iran kills any people taking part in protests in Tehran and other Iranian cities.
item.content:encoded: President Trump is threatening he will take action if Iran kills any people taking part in protests in Tehran and other Iranian cities.
item.dc:creator: Jackie Northam

item.title: What 'Stranger Things' gets right about wormholes
item.description: The much anticipated series finale of Netflix's Stranger Things is predicated on wormholes — a concept in physics that often appears in science fiction. So what are wormholes?
item.content:encoded: The much anticipated series finale of Netflix's Stranger Things is predicated on wormholes — a concept in physics that often appears in science fiction. So what are wormholes?
item.dc:creator: Katia Riddle

item.title: Trump Administration heightens fraud charges against Minnesota, pauses day care funds
item.description: The Trump administration says its stopping federal funds to Minnesota because of fraud. The day cares and the state are fighting back.
item.content:encoded: The Trump administration says its stopping federal funds to Minnesota because of fraud. The day cares and the state are fighting back.
item.dc:creator: Dana Ferguson

item.title: Trump says brighter days are ahead for American farmers
item.description: President Trump says 2026 will be better for American farmers, thanks in part to $12 billion in new federal "bridge payments." But do farmers share that optimism?
item.content:encoded: President Trump says 2026 will be better for American farmers, thanks in part to $12 billion in new federal "bridge payments." But do farmers share that optimism?
item.dc:creator: Kirk Siegler

item.title: A new analysis reveals clues about when primates started walking on two feet
item.description: A big difference between humans and other apes is the ability to stride easily on two feet. A new analysis of fossil bones shows that adaptations for bipedal walking go back 7 million years.
item.content:encoded: A big difference between humans and other apes is the ability to stride easily on two feet. A new analysis of fossil bones shows that adaptations for bipedal walking go back 7 million years.
item.dc:creator: Nell Greenfieldboyce

item.title: Hunting for Pokemon cards? Maybe skip stores and try a card show
item.description: Pokemon cards are having a moment, making it hard to find them in stores and at fair prices. Collectors say going to a card show is one way to find cards and fair prices.
item.content:encoded: Pokemon cards are having a moment, making it hard to find them in stores and at fair prices. Collectors say going to a card show is one way to find cards and fair prices.
item.dc:creator: Vincent Acovino

item.title: A look ahead at politics in 2026
item.description: We discuss the big political questions heading into the new year, including who will control Congress.
item.content:encoded: We discuss the big political questions heading into the new year, including who will control Congress.
item.dc:creator: Domenico Montanaro

item.title: Kevin Curry of 'Fit Men Cook' on how to find no and low cost groceries
item.description: If you find yourself having trouble affording food, there are options. Kevin Curry of Fit Men Cook talks about strategies for finding no and low cost groceries.
item.content:encoded: If you find yourself having trouble affording food, there are options. Kevin Curry of Fit Men Cook talks about strategies for finding no and low cost groceries.
item.dc:creator: Marielle Segarra
